import {BadgeCheckIcon, ChipIcon} from '@heroicons/react/outline' import React from "react"; import { skills } from '../../Data/skills.js' export default function Skills() { return(

Skills & Technologies

My skills are well rounded accross the full stack including both backend and frontend technologies.

{skills.map((skill) => (
{skill}
))}

); }
